definition[0]: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot
example[0]: The curtains were an inch too short.
example[1]: Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
example[3]: Derek leaned closer, his face only inches from hers.
example[4]: The bus missed us by inches.
example[5]: On several occasions, they came within inches of death.
definition[2]: to move very slowly in a particular direction, or to make something do this
example[6]: I inched forward along the ground.
